1318360.name: Blaze Revolutions Soundtrack
1318360.description:
From the deep underground of the Dutch hip-hop and freeparty scene comes the haunting but relaxed soundtrack of Blaze Revolutions. All tracks by Bram Baart a.k.a. Wazig04. Expect instrumental hip-hop in the style of the Golden Age with a whiff of electronics. This is additional content for the Blaze Revolutions game, but does not include the base game.

Tracklist:
01- A city covered in darkness
02 - SomaCorp Tyrannies
03- Blazecrew rolling phat
04- Dial 420 for revolution
05- Blaze Revolutions Theme
06- A movement rises from smoke and ashes
07- Puffin' on the clouds
08- When hope is evicted
09- Elemental Flows
10- Back on the road again
11- Can't sleep through this rave revolution
12- Always Carry A Blunt
13- Tone Rebels
14- The great escape
15- Capitol beats
16- A night in Nakatomi plaza
17- Drive through the dustbowl
18- Fresh herbs
19- Plucking Flowers
20- Spaced Out Smokers
21- Rise of the revolution Part 1
22- Rise of the revolution Part 2
developers: Bram Crispijn Baart aka Wazig024 from Melomania Recordings
